casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
Jerrod Ashley WILSON No. 1998-KO-1135 Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 20, 2018

ON RECONSIDERATION FROM THE LOUISIANA SUPREME COURT

Application for reconsideration not considered. HUGHES, J., concurs and assigns reasons. Hughes, J. concurs.

If the Third Circuit Court of Appeal instructed the District Court to clarify relator's commitment order, and the District Court has failed to do so, relator should seek relief from the Court of Appeal to enforce its order.
